findings.title: Floating Solidity Pragma
findings.description: The smart contracts use a floating Solidity pragma which implies that these contracts are not bound to a specific compiler version. This poses potential risks for contracts that are deployed in live environments.

findings.title: Unauthenticated Exposed APIs
findings.description: APIs except get_contracts() and get_events() modify the database without authentication, allowing unauthorized access to sensitive data.

findings.title: Consider validation of all API inputs
findings.description: Validate all API inputs, even between internal services (Like Protocol Wallet and wallet-blockchain-interface).

findings.title: Unencrypted API
findings.description: The protocol wallet employs plain http to export its API without encryption, leaving communication vulnerable to interception by malicious actors.
